summary: SummaryHighlightsClean Ingredientsbelif's The True Cream Moisturizing Bomb is a cushiony, whipped textured moisturizer clinically tested to deliver up to 48 hours of explosive moisture and to recharge the moisture barrier.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsPeptide: helps improve skin's elasticityCeramide: helps improve skin's moisture barrierSqualane: helps stabilize the skin's moisture barrier and maintain skin hydrationResearch ResultsClinically tested to retain skin's moisture for up to 48 hoursClinically proven to restore the skin barrier100% agree that there is immediate improvement in skin dryness*100% agree that moisturizer helped enhance skin's moisture barrier*100% agree that skin barrier feels stronger*100% agree that this moisturizer improved skin damage due to moisture loss*Targets: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven TextureProvides long-lasting moisturization to dry skin and is reformulated with two Napiers Formulas and better-for-you ingredients Peptide, Ceramide and Squalane to help improve skinâ€™s moisture barrier and skin elasticityDermatologically testedIdeal Skin Types: Normal, Dry, Combination*Based on a consumer studyFormulated WithoutMineral OilSynthetic FragrancesSynthetic ColorsSynthetic PreservativesItem 2619877How To UseAfter cleansing and toner, apply dime-sized or desired amount to face in a gentle patting motion. Can be used daily, morning and night.Discontinue use if irritation or rash occurs. Consult a physician if irritation persists. Do not use on broken or damaged skin. Avoid eye area. Keep out of reach of children. Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight. For external use only.IngredientsWater/Eau, Glycerin, Cyclohexasiloxane, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Dipropylene Glycol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Triethylhexanoin, Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Stearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-40 Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Symphytum Officinale Leaf Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Nepeta Cataria Extract*, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract*, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract*, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract*, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract**, Viola Tricolor Extract**, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract**, Spiraea Ulmaria Flower Extract**, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract**, Euphrasia Officinalis Extract, Thuja Occidentalis Leaf Extract, Achillea Millefolium Flower Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Menyanthes Trifoliata Leaf Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Poncirus Trifoliata Fruit Extract, Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract, C14-22 Alcohols, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Arachidyl Glucoside, Ceramide Np, Cholesterol, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Tocopherol, Panthenol, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Urea, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Viscum Album (Mistletoe) Extract, Glycosyl Trehalose, Lactobacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Stearic Acid, Tromethamine, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Olivate, Palmitic Acid, Sorbitan Olivate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Xanthan Gum, Trisodium Edta, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Stearate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil***, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil***, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil***, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil***, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Citral, Linalool.*Napiers Original Formula**Napiers reviews.headline: Belief face cream
reviews.comments: I love this face cream, it's luxurious, it feels great putting it on and is super hydrating.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again.
reviews.comments: So hydrating and soft on the skin.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing Bomb!
reviews.comments:
I got this moisturizer in a gwp, and just recently decided to try it. I applied a generous layer as the final step in my evening skincare routine, and wow! I can't believe how much I like it!

I have very dry, sensitive skin, so I'm pretty picky about the products I'll use on my face. This product checks all the boxes! It doesn't pill. At all. I layer several products, and still never get any balling or pilling. My face stays nice and hydrated without feeling greasy or sticky. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: A HOLY GRAIL ITEM!
reviews.comments: If I could give this 10 stars I would. I've been buying this for over 5 years and it is absolutely amazing! It's not greasy and really hydrates for 24 hours. Can not recommend this enough!

reviews.headline: Not great for acne prone skin
reviews.comments: it is definitely hydrating and a LITTLE goes a long way. didn't work great with my skin, I have combo acne prone/sensitive skin and it made me break out. the aqua bomb works a lot better in my opinion!

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: This has been my go to moisturizer for years now. I've repurchased dozens of times and continue to come back to it.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. I suffer from Lupus rashes and it soothed and cooled my face. The aqua bomb did not irritate face.

reviews.headline: amazing HG moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've used many moisturizers -Drunk elephant, youth to the people, herbivore - but I always come back to this. This is the best moisturizer for me. The packaging is a little basic and simple, but it's super effective. It made my smile line disappear lol. I will be rebuying over and over again.

reviews.headline: My holy grail moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have pretty normal to dry skin, leaning sensitive. This makes my skin so moisturized and feels AMAZING. No other moisturizer comes close for me. I absolutely love the way my skin absorbs it.

reviews.headline: LOVE!
reviews.comments: My a tome favorite mositurizer. Soaks right on and feels great on your skin.

reviews.headline: Safe for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this moisturizer! Definitely helps in the winter time when my skin feels dry and flaky. I have sensitive skin and it does not break me out.

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer! Even for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Ive tried major and most popular moisturizers but this one right here is the best one! I love how moisturized it leaves my skin & i love how i can go out with out any makeup and my skin looks so GREAT. It's seriously worth it.

reviews.headline: Excellent moisturizer
reviews.comments:
I bought this as I was searching for an affordable dupe of the Tatcha moisturing cream. This is really close to it as it is hydrating, leaves your skin feeling and looking supple, and decent price point. Korean are known for their products and this one does not disappoint even during the winter dey weather, it hydrates and sits well under makeup.

Only con to me is the packaging. I wish it came in a tube for easier travel.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: Got this as a freebie and I absolutely love it! I purchesed a bigger size. Its soo cooling and hydrating. Doesnt pill like some moistureizers and isnt sticky.

reviews.headline: Very disappointed, this used to be my favorite moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have used this product for several year and loved it, but the new formula is drastically different and makes my skin burn and leaves my skin feeling greasy. The scent used to be a natural herbal scent, but now smells like chemicals. So sad and disappointed, I would've stocked up on the original formula if I'd know they were going to ruin it!

reviews.headline: Best Moisturizer Ever
reviews.comments: I'm not sure why rhis doesn't habe more reviews this is the best moisturizer ever. I the cream on in the fall/winter and the aqua one in the summer.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I got this as a freebie, but I love it! It's so moisturizing, and makes me look so glowy! I feel like an angel ðŸ˜‚

reviews.headline: Belif moisturizing bomb
reviews.comments: Love this moisturizer! Absorbs right into my skin doesn't feel heavy or greasy on my skin. I have dry skin. It helps a whole lot with my redness and exema. Would definitely recommend!!

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer for dry skin
reviews.comments: Ive always had issues with moisturizers not keeping my skin hydrated through out the day/night, and most ive used are so oily theyve causes acne. I tried this one as a sample ulta sent me and immediately repurchased. Im on my 4th one from the last 8 months so my only complaint is i wish they sold a larger size. A staple in my skin care!!!!

reviews.headline: Loved it before the reformulation
reviews.comments: This used to be my holy grail PM moisturizer until they reformulated. My new container of this burns my skin and gave me an eczema flare up around my mouth and eyes. I'm so disappointed in this because I loved it and would have continued to pay the expensive price for such a good moisturizer. The plain CeraVe has worked better than this, which is so frustrating when this was my FAVORITE. Please go back to the original formula. If I'm going to pay this much for a moisturizer, I want quality ingredients.

media.headline: I would definitely buy this product again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I wanted to give this cream a good use before providing a review and I've come to say, I love it! Open opening it, the package is very sleek and I love the colors. The initial claims on the packaging say "clinically tested to retain skins moisture for up to 48 hrs, dermatologically tested." I'm someone that has very sensitive, dry, prone to breakouts on my chin, red skin. I do suffer from rosacea and the dry skin on my cheeks sometimes it a lot to deal with. This cream has significantly helped it and has not caused a flare up that I can usually get with other products. The cream itself is nice and lightweight, not oily or tacky once applied. It sinks right into your skin and doesn't leave behind a weird residue feel. I'm usually someone that doesn't like scented stuff, but the scent on this is so light and smells lightly citrus with a hint of herbal. The smell fades once the cream has sunk into the skin. The biggest thing that I've mentioned and love about this is it did not break me out or flare up any skin issues I have.  This product is made in Korea and with all the hype surrounding kbeauty products and that glass skin look, I think I am sold and will continue to use this cream over time!
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
The Belief believe in truth, The true cream, moisturiing bomb  works to soften and moisturize 
my skin, but it feels cold and tingling when I apply it on. It feels a little numb in and around the area I put on when it sets into my skin. It also made my skin look a little blotchy. It looks like I am allergic to it.
faceoff_negative.headline: I had an allergic reaction to it
